description: Pradical is a business consulting firm that provides technical solutions leveraging spatial and on-ground intelligence. It boasts a rich history of clientele consisting of Harvard University, Puhas Farms, Transerve Technologies, INBEX, and Horizon Hospitals.
tasks: Led the end-to-end design and development team of 5 to deploy mobile and web solutions across 2 products.
Built Puhas Farms - a product suite to automate the supply chain and provide a CMS for fresh harvest through a marketplace for over 100K+ local consumers and businesses.

Built INBEX - a centralised platform to solve the matching efficiency problem in the biofuel trading space by facilitating a yearly trade of over 20 million rupees between medium-scale factories and individual traders.
Designed the micro-service architecture for automated quality assessment and supply chain tracking using AWS cloud.
